argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_id | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> H Isom R , S ( A , B ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_isof1o | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> H : A -1-1-onto-> B ) |
| 3 |  | #P_f1ofun | |- ( H : A -1-1-onto-> B -> Fun H ) |
| 4 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_funimaex | |- ( Fun H -> ( H " x ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_3syl | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> ( H " x ) e. _V ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_isoselem | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> ( R Se A -> S Se B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_isocnv | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> `' H Isom S , R ( B , A ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_isof1o | |- ( `' H Isom S , R ( B , A ) -> `' H : B -1-1-onto-> A ) |
| 10 |  | #P_f1ofun | |- ( `' H : B -1-1-onto-> A -> Fun `' H ) |
| 11 | 4 | #P_funimaex | |- ( Fun `' H -> ( `' H " x ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_4syl | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> ( `' H " x ) e. _V ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_isoselem | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> ( S Se B -> R Se A ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_impbid | |- ( H Isom R , S ( A , B ) -> ( R Se A <-> S Se B ) ) |
